channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
channel.description:
>## [color=steblue]The Outsider[/color] >[color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **Shady (Passive)** - Anyone who investigates you to determine faction will think you are the opposite of their faction. (Unseen/Cult for BD, BD for Unseen/Cult) **Outside (Passive)** - Since you don't live in the castle, you are immune to visitation at night if you don't perform any night actions. **Vengeful (Day)** - If a target player is a vote away from being put on stand, you can send a "bonus" (meaning you can also normal vote) anonymous vote against them. Everyone will receive the message "An Outsider/Insider used an extra vote on x." - 2 uses. **Defensive (Day, Special)** - 25% of the votes to majority against you on any day are unknowingly negated. (This effectively means to be voted up, you need 75% + 1 votes) The people who vote you will think their vote went through, and you will know that they attempted to vote you and failed, but nobody else will see any of the votes. **Break In (Night)** - Break into someone's room tonight. They will either be inside or missing. A player will be missing if they visited someone else that night or were the Prince and had someone jailed. Otherwise, they will be inside. If they are inside, they will know who you are and that you are the Outsider. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>## [color=purple]The Insider[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Sneaky (Passive)** - You are immune to visitation at night if you don't perform any night actions. **Vengeful (Day)** - If a target player is a vote away from being put on stand, you can send a "bonus" (meaning you can also use your regular vote as normal) anonymous vote against them. Everyone will receive the message "An Outsider/Insider used an extra vote on x." - 2 uses. **Defensive (Day, Special)** - 25% of the votes to majority against you on any day are unknowingly negated. (This effectively means to be voted up, you need 75% + 1 votes) The people who vote you will think their vote went through, and you will know that they attempted to vote you and failed, but nobody else will see any of the votes. **Break In (Night)** - Break into someone's room tonight. They will either be inside or missing. A player will be missing if they visited someone else that night or were the Prince and had someone jailed. Otherwise, they will be inside. If they are inside, they will know who you are and think that you are the Outsider. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Being hard to vote counts as preventing their death

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
That would be why I mentioned three other things…?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
preventing their death does not help the unseen on it’s own

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Hard to vote, and assists in voting. Can “confirm” themselves with Break In, or stay back and prevent their death.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
but what does the insider contribute to the unseen?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Hmm. The unseen version is too much like the outsider version imo

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Outsider/The Insider [BD/UNS Social]
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
The Outsider

Blue Dragon Social
Shady (Passive) - Anyone who investigates you to determine faction will think you are the opposite of their faction. (Unseen/Cult for BD, BD for Unseen/Cult)
Outside (Passive) - Since you don’t live in the castle, you are immune to visitation at night if you don’t perform any night actions.
Vengeful (Day) - If a target player is a vote away from being put on stand, you can send a “bonus” (meaning you can also normal vote) anonymous vote against them. Everyone will receive the message “An Outsider/Insider used an extra vote on x.” - 2 uses.
Defensive (Day, Special) - 25% of the votes to majority against you on any day are unknowingly negated. (This effectively means to be voted up, you need 75% + 1 votes) The people who vote you will think their vote went through, and you will know that they attempted to vote you and failed, but nobody else will see any of the votes.
Break In (Night) - Break into someone’s room tonight. They will either be inside or missing. A player will be missing if they visited someone else that night or were the Prince and had someone jailed. Otherwise, they will be inside. If they are inside, they will know who you are and that you are the Outsider. - Infinite uses.
Defeat the Unseen and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Insider

Unseen Social
Sneaky (Passive) - You are immune to visitation at night if you don’t perform any night actions.
Vengeful (Day) - If a target player is a vote away from being put on stand, you can send a “bonus” (meaning you can also use your regular vote as normal) anonymous vote against them. Everyone will receive the message “An Outsider/Insider used an extra vote on x.” - 2 uses.
Defensive (Day, Special) - 25% of the votes to majority against you on any day are unknowingly negated. (This effectively means to be voted up, you need 75% + 1 votes) The people who vote you will think their vote went through, and you will know that they attempted to vote you and failed, but nobody else will see any of the votes.
Break In (Night) - Break into someone’s room tonight. They will either be inside or missing. A player will be missing if they visited someone else that night or were the Prince and had someone jailed. Otherwise, they will be inside. If they are inside, they will know who you are and think that you are the Outsider. - Infinite uses.
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Read full topic
